| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line289](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line289 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

A **jiggling blob**, b, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). It is a type of [blob](/wiki/Blob "Blob") similar to the quivering blob, though it also possesses an [acidic](/wiki/Acidic "Acidic") body.

A jiggling blob has a touch attack and a passive acid attack, and possesses [sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance") and [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance").

A jiggling blob [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") is not acidic to eat despite its passive attack, and eating its corpse or [tin](/wiki/Tin "Tin") has a 2⁄3 chance of conveying poison resistance.

## Generation

Randomly generated jiggling blobs are always generated hostile. Jiggling blobs will not randomly generate in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom").

## Encyclopedia entry

- *See the [encyclopedia entry for amoeboid](/wiki/Amoeboid#Encyclopedia_entry "Amoeboid").*

* *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Jiggling_blob\&action=edit)*

html:
Jiggling blob

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
b jiggling blob
Difficulty 11
Attacks Touch 2d8, Passive 2d4 acid
b jiggling blob
Difficulty 11
Attacks

Touch 2d8, Passive 2d4 acid

Base level 10
Base experience 224
Speed 6
Base AC 8
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 200
Nutritional value 100
Size Large
Resistances sleep, poison
Resistances conveyed poison (67%)

A jiggling blob:

  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • wanders randomly.
  • does not appear in Gehennom.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line289

A jiggling blob, b, is a type of monster that appears in SLASH'EM, SlashTHEM and Hack'EM. It is a type of blob similar to the quivering blob, though it also possesses an acidic body.

A jiggling blob has a touch attack and a passive acid attack, and possesses sleep resistance and poison resistance.

A jiggling blob corpse is not acidic to eat despite its passive attack, and eating its corpse or tin has a 2⁄3 chance of conveying poison resistance.

Generation

Randomly generated jiggling blobs are always generated hostile. Jiggling blobs will not randomly generate in Gehennom.

Encyclopedia entry

See the encyclopedia entry for amoeboid.
This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''jiggling blob''', {{monsym|jiggling blob}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[SLASH'EM]], [[SlashTHEM]] and [[Hack'EM]]. It is a type of [[blob]] similar to the quivering blob, though it also possesses an [[acidic]] body.

A jiggling blob has a touch attack and a passive acid attack, and possesses [[sleep resistance]] and [[poison resistance]].

A jiggling blob [[corpse]] is not acidic to eat despite its passive attack, and eating its corpse or [[tin]] has a {{frac|2|3}} chance of conveying poison resistance.

==Generation==
Randomly generated jiggling blobs are always generated hostile. Jiggling blobs will not randomly generate in [[Gehennom]].
